layout.singingstanza: Je -- ho -- vah by wis -- dom has found -- ed the earth; Es -- tab -- lished the heav -- en with all of its worth; His knowl -- edge, His on -- ly, made deep riv -- ers flow; And the skies drop down dew on the grass here be -- low. Ha -- la -- la -- la -- la -- la -- la -- la -- le -- lu -- jah! Ha -- la -- la -- la -- la -- la -- la -- la -- le -- lu -- jah!

lyrics.stanza: Oh, don't let this wisdom depart from your sight. Tis Life for your soul—this knowledge so bright Your feet will not stumble as you walk down the street; You won't be afraid and your sleep will be sweet.
